reasonableness_standard: standard of reasonableness applies to judicial reviews of factual findings by the RPD
credibility_findings: inconsistencies in testimony and PIF, questioning credibility
review_standard: deference to RPD's expertise unless findings are perverse, capricious, or based on misapprehension of evidence
decision_outcome: application for judicial review is denied
burden_of_proof: RPD's decision was reasonable and within its discretion
specific_group_membership: membership in an underground Christian church
